black_cards.text: _____ always helps "Insert Name" prepare for a big exam.
_____ always starts out fun until "Insert Name" gets involved.
"Insert Name's" aptitude tst shows he/she is either suited to be a Doctor or _____.
"Insert Name's" class trip was completely ruined by _____.
"Insert Name" believes that on the 7th day the Lord said let there be _____.
"Insert Name" has a weakness for kittens, puppies and _____.
"Insert Name" loves to use _____ to get him/her off.
"Insert Name" Offered two homeless people lots of _____ in order for them to fight to the death.
"Insert Name" says _____ tastes like chicken.
"Insert Name" says if there were an Olympic sport for _____ he/she would win gold.
"Insert Name" thought getting abducted by Captain Hook would be scary, turns out they both enjoy _____.
"Insert Name" traded _____ for a vial of pristine Gypsy tears.
"Insert Name" wanted a pony but got _____ instead.
"Insert Name" would love to see _____ as the new school mascot.
Dear Parent, we regret to inform you that "Insert Name" will no longer be allowed on school property after he/she involvement with _____.
Do not fuck with "Insert Name", while he/she is watching _____ online.
During sex "Insert Name" likes to imagine he/she is _____.
Every Sunday "Insert Name" goes to market to sell _____, and every time comes home with Magic Beans.
For "Insert Name's" magic trick next he/she will pull _____ out of a hat.
I am not sure what "Insert Name" has up his/her ass, but I think it might be _____.
I missed my last flight to Utah because "Insert Name" hid _____ in my luggage and I was detained by Airport security.
If "Insert Name's" life were turned into a musical it would be called the Sound of _____.
In chemistry lab today "Insert Name" learned how to make explosives by/with _____.
In psychology "Insert Name" learned that basic human needs include _____.
Next to lollipops, _____ is/are "Insert Name's" favourite things to lick.
The best excuse "Insert Name" could come up with for being late for work involved a crossing guard and _____.
We all know the phrase "What happens in Vegas, Stays in Vegas" so why did "Insert Name" bring home _____?
When "Insert Name" was a child they used to use building blocks to create _____.
You hear the craziest stuff in methadone clinic lineups, this morning I overheard "Insert Name" having a heated conversations about _____.
